definition[0]: an inaugural speech is the first given by someone who is starting an important job
example[1]: the inaugural lecture of the new Professor of American Literature
definition[1]: an inaugural event is the first in a planned series of similar events
example[3]: the inaugural match of Major League Soccer
definition[2]: the first in a series of meetings, flights etc
example[4]: The problem was detected on the plane’s inaugural flight.
definition[3]: a speech, lecture etc given by a person who has taken up an important position, to introduce themselves and their ideas
example[5]: In hisinaugural address, the president called attention to the needs of the homeless.
